response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is valued at $8,000 to both of us. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $7,200. This is a special opportunity to own a piece that truly stands out in its category. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and if you would like to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 7200}
